introduction: My name is Haoxian(Cohen) Kang, and I hold a Bachelor's degree in Mathematics of Computation from UCLA. I have been a software engineer working in frontend and backend since 2023.
aboutMe: As a young boy my favorite toys were Legos and puzzles. Legos gave me the creative freedom piece by piece to bring to life whatever I imagined, creativity and imagination were the only rules. Puzzles taught me to be a critical thinker and more importantly to never give up. Due to what I liked as a child, I naturally gravitated towards programming. Just as with Legos and puzzles, programming allows me to bring my ideas to life, add my own personal touch and exercise my problem solving skills.
hobbies: Surrounded by people that enjoyed the sport, a full body workout and develops hand-eye coordination the sport naturally rubbed off on me.

I love to express my creativity, and origami is the perfect mix of complex geometry and problem-solving. Along with its multitude of applications in technology, such as NASA's probes, it's also a beautiful art form.
Skipping traffic on grocery trips, getting a break from technology and the breeze blowing against my face when I am out on a ride feels great.
It's great to leave the city behind once in a while to relax outdoors, take in what nature has to offer and enjoy the company of friends and family.
Building these model kits is a joy as I get see the ingenuity and mechanical engineering employed to fit so much detail into such a small and compact package.
What started out as an elective class to fill a semester quickly became a pastime to relax the mind and give me a quiet place to concentrate and reflect on my thoughts.
resources: Copy of my resume on Google Drive
